subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The 49-year-old Hopkins lasted 12 rounds, but he could not match the relentlessness of Sergey Kovalev, who won a unanimous victory in the Atlantic City bout.
snippet: The 49-year-old Hopkins lasted 12 rounds, but he could not match the relentlessness of Sergey Kovalev, who won a unanimous victory in the Atlantic City bout.
